## Electoral Summary

### Data source

ABS state electorate boundaries in ESRI shapefile format. 2017 release.

http://www.abs.gov.au/AUSSTATS/abs@.nsf/DetailsPage/1270.0.55.003July%202017?OpenDocument

```{r}
state_shapes <-
 read_sf(dsn = "./data/state_shapes")

plot(state_shapes)

state_shapes %>%
  head()
```
